Texts.Chs: 把^orange;50份硅^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;10 silicon^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 鼓励。请多多尝试各种材料，如木材、泥土、石头等多种材料，你会发现几乎什么东西都可以提取。
Texts.Eng: Encouraging. Try the same thing with other materials such as wood, dirt, stone...heck, almost anything really. You'll find all sorts of things if you just give it a try!

Instructive. Now that you have an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; you can start cutting your teeth on all sorts of new creations. Try getting at least 50 ^green;sand^reset; and extracting from it to get ^orange;10 silicon^reset;.
